title: [NoobSubs] Sengoku Basara S1 01-13 + SP 01-07(1080p Blu-ray MP4)
description:
[NoobSubs] Sengoku Basara S1 01-13 + SP 01-07 + Extras (1080p Blu-ray 8bit AAC MP4)

This took me a really long time to do but here you have it, Sengoku Basara Season 1. I did some error corrections on the subs because I noticed some mistakes while watching it, mostly in episode 6.

This download includes Sengoku Basara Season 1 + OVA (episode 11.5) + Mini Sengoku Basara: Chousokabe-kun to Mouri Special Episodes 01-07 + Scans + Creditless OP/ED.
